{"step_by_step_thinking": "The zygomatic bone, also known as the cheekbone, articulates with several other bones in the skull. According to Document [0], the zygomatic bone articulates with the maxilla, the temporal bone, the sphenoid bone, and the frontal bone. Therefore, the zygomatic bone does not articulate with the nasal bone.", "answer_choice": "C. Nasal bone"}
